headline: Northern Trust Expands Global Family Office Services
summary: CHICAGO, April 02, 2025--Northern Trust Wealth Management is expanding its family office suite of services by launching Family Office Solutions, a new offering designed to provide ultra-high-net-worth families with customized financial and wealth management services without requiring a standalone office.
